#summary Folder Structure of project sources.

 * staub - _root folder of sources_
  * lib - _runtime and compile-time libraries_
  * resources - _configuration resources(xml, properties, etc.)_
   * META-INF - _resources placed into META-INF folder in ear or jar_
   * WEB-INF - _resources placed into WEB-INF folder in war_
  * staubEJB
   * src - _business layer java sources_
  * staubWEB
   * src - _presentation layer sources_
   * web - _web content_
